title: 反伸手(Chinglish)
author: player927
txt_content:
I joined in the forum in June,2014.Now,half a year past,I have seen so many people who only read threads but always exit from it without replying.We call them "Hand-Stretching Party".Their existion is truly a bad and abnormal phenomenon.I hate them.Everything,no matter who its author is or how about it,they always do like that.Sometimes a thread has been read for more than two hundred times, but only about ten people reply it.Yes-Only five percent of readers reply it.It should be about 20 or 30 percents.
    I guess that almost all people here hate them.Here is some tips against that:
1.At first,don't be one of them.After all,if you are one of them and don't ready to leave it,how to resist it?
2.Tell them about the advantages to reply threads.It could make them realize the benefition.
3.Last but the most important,write thread with better quality.They will be shamed if they don't reply it.
    I hope what I say in this thread is helpful!

replies.txt_content: I hate your grammar, but you are adorable.

replies.author: aleng
replies.txt_content:
谷歌机翻。
我加入了6月份，2014.Now论坛，半年过去，我见过这么多的人谁只读线程，但总是退出它没有replying.We称他们为“手工绷网党”。他们existion是一个真正的坏的和不正常的phenomenon.I恨them.Everything，无论谁是它的作者是或怎么样，他们总是不喜欢that.Sometimes一个线程已经阅读超过200次，但只有约10人回复it.Yes读者 - 只有5％的回复it.It应约20或30百分比。
????我想，几乎所有在这里的人讨厌them.Here是对一些小窍门：
1.At第一，不要them.After所有的之一，如果你是其中之一，并没有准备好离开它，如何抵挡呢？
2.Tell他们有关的优势回复threads.It可以让他们实现benefition。
3.Last但最重要的是，编写线程更好quality.They会羞愧，如果他们不答复。
????我希望我说什么在这个线程是很有帮助的！
